title: За гранью реального
overview: Incredible events, modern achievements, cataclysms and mysterious coincidences, amazing inventions and mystical phenomena - all this will be told by three hosts of the program "Beyond the Real": Sergey Druzhko, Petr Korneev and Vasilisa Shatunova."Beyond the Real" is an educational project about events and phenomena that expand our horizons and turn our understanding of the world around us upside down! The daily TV magazine "Beyond the Real" covers the entire spectrum of interests of the audience that wants to learn more about this world and what is beyond reality.What is a UFO? What threatens humanity? Who really lived on Earth before us? And much more...
